name: seethrough
description:
You find yourself in another dimension. Among the darkness, paths guide you toward otherworldly sights.

Made with Godot for the Monthly Game Jam#2.

Controls

- move : arrow keys/left-pad

- change color palette (purely cosmetic): c and v/left and right bumpers

Credits

The font is Secuela Bold.

The sounds are from OpenGameArt (full list here)

Source

https://github.com/quibarnacle/seethrough
